project_plan.description: Develop a simple quiz game in Python that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks their score, and displays the score at the end of the game.

tas.n: Implement the quiz game logic to display questions and capture user input
Store multiple-choice questions and their corresponding answers in a variable
Implement score tracking based on user input
Display the user's score at the end of the quiz
Write tests to verify the correctness of the quiz game features
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure functionality and correctness
